name: Devnex Addons For Elementor
author: Devnex

sections.description:
“Devnex Addons For Elementor” is described as one of the best Elementor addons with over 45+ easy-to-use custom widgets

45+ FREE WIDGETS AND COUNTING

We have designed 45+ of the most useful widgets to enhance your Elementor Page Building experience and allow you to climb the top of your design capabilities.

Fully Customizable

Each element offers a plethora of options to tailor your website exactly to your liking. With your creativity, you can achieve virtually any design.

Lightweight & Instant Loading

No extra resources or messy code to bog down your website. Optimized for super-fast loading and instant live editing.

Expert Support

Our exceptional support team is always on standby to assist you. Whether you have questions, need guidance, or encounter any issues, you can reach out through our support forum, live chat, or contact form for direct assistance.

Basic Widgets

1.Accordion: Organize content efficiently with foldable sections using customizable options.
2.Animated Headline: Add dynamic and eye-catching headlines to your website.
3.Advanced Infinite Text: Display text content in an infinite loop for continuous engagement.
5.Advanced Testimonial: Showcase user reviews and testimonials with advanced features.
5.Button: Enhance user experience with Bootstrap’s custom button styles for various actions.
6.Breadcrumbs: Improve website navigation with hierarchical path display.
7.Client Logo: Showcase clients or products stylishly on your website.
8.Contact Form: Easily create user-friendly contact forms without coding.
9.Countdown: Create urgency and engagement with countdown timer features.
10.Counter: Showcase facts and figures in a visually appealing way.
11.Chart: Visualize data effectively with customizable chart widgets.
12.Elastic Stack: Utilize Elastic Stack for advanced data analysis and visualization.
13.Fancy Text: Grab attention with eye-catching animated text.
14.Flip Box: Add interactive 3D effects to your website.
15.Gallery Grid: Present images in a visually appealing grid layout.
16.Gallery Justified: Create beautiful justified galleries with customizable options.
17.Gallery Masonry: Implement stylish galleries with masonry layout and hover effects.
18.Gallery Metro: Enhance galleries with metro-style layout and dynamic designs.
19.Heading: Adorn headlines with multiple fancy styles.
20.Horizontal Accordion: Organize content horizontally with foldable sections.
21.Icon Box: Display services or products with customizable icon boxes.
22.Icon List: Present information in a list format using customizable icons.
23.Image: Create engaging image boxes integrating visuals with textual elements.
24.Image Comparison: Showcase before-and-after images with customization options.
25.Image Marker: Display image pins with product details or prices.
26.Image Slider: Present images dynamically in slider format.
27.Infinite Image Box: Continuously display images in an engaging loop.
28.Instagram: Integrate Instagram feeds into your website.
29.Mailchimp: Seamlessly integrate Mailchimp into your Elementor pages.
30.Map Box: Provide location-based information with interactive maps.
31.Post Grid: Display posts in a visually appealing grid layout on your website.
32.Post Zoom: Enhance user engagement by allowing visitors to zoom in on individual posts for a detailed view.
33.Pricing Table: Clearly describe product value with customizable pricing tables.
34.Progress Bar: Keep audience informed about task or project progress.
35.Site Logo: Display your website’s logo in various styles.
36.Slider: Create dynamic content showcases with versatile slider widgets.
37.Social Icons: Enhance website connectivity with easy social media integration.
38.Social Share: Amplify content reach with social sharing widgets.
39.Tab Horizontal: Organize content with horizontal tabs.
40.Tabs Vertical: Organize content with vertical tabs.
41.Team Member: Showcase team members with bios and social media links.
42.Testimonial: Build credibility with positive feedback and reviews.
43.Testimonial Infinite: Display testimonials in an infinite loop.
44.Text Infinite: Display text content in an infinite loop.
45.Timeline: Tell stories chronologically with interactive timeline widgets.
46.Toggle Switch: Add interactivity to website with intuitive toggle widgets.
47.Video Popup: Engage audience with interactive video popups.
48.Canvas Menu: Enhance Navigation with a Modern Touch
49.Radial Progress: Visualize Progress with Style
50.Infinite Testimonial: Showcase Continuous Praise Seamlessly
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin directly from the WordPress plugins screen.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.

  3. To access all available elements, type “DNE” on your element tabs within the Elementor editor.

  4. You can also find them listed under the “Devnex Addons” category in your Elementor widget list.
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No, the plugin requires Elementor as it is an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It works with any theme that supports Elementor.

Font Awesome Icons are not visible?

You need to enable compatibility for Font Awesome 4 from Elementor -> Extra Settings.
